message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I'm willing to offer you a great deal at $18,000. This is a fantastic opportunity to get your hands on this valuable product.

Alice, I appreciate your offer, but $18,000 is significantly above my budget. I'm interested in the product but would be willing to pay $10,000 for it.  This is a fair price for both of us, considering my maximum budget.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $18,000 is above your budget, but I'm not willing to sell it for $10,000. I'm willing to compromise and offer you a price of $14,000. This is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Alice, I appreciate you moving closer to my price point.  While I value the product, $14,000 is still a stretch for my budget.  I'm willing to go up to $12,000. Let's find a middle ground to make this deal work.

I understand that $12,000 is still a bit below my target price, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll offer you a price of $13,500. This is the best I can do, considering the product's value to me.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise. While $13,500 is a great price, I'm still hoping to get a bit closer to my budget. I'm prepared to offer $12,500.  This is a fair price that reflects the value of the product and allows for a mutually beneficial agreement. Let's see if we can seal the deal!

I understand that you're trying to get as close to your budget as possible, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll offer you a price of $13,000. This is the lowest I can go without losing money on the deal.
